title: Ban phase just needs to be renamed to "What bullshit do I feel like putting up with this game?"
body:
Fucking give us ten bans already.

EDIT:

For those of you demanding reasoning behind my post, I'll explain.

Every meta there seems to be champions that are basically must bans because anyone playing them that's even halfway decent at them will just rip your team a new asshole. 

Then you have champions who are just so incredibly frustrating to deal with that you might as well go smash your face against a brick wall.

And then at the VERY BOTTOM of the spectrum, you have champions that actually counter your team comp... except banning them means you leave open the other two categories and the game turns into a shit show anyways.

Now, I don't know about any of you, but I should be able to ban champions who actually counter my comp without being fisted by champions who are poorly designed and balanced.
